whatAreCells.title: What are Cells?
whatAreCells.description: Cells are small groups that meet weekly to study the Bible, pray together, and build each other up in faith. It's a place of intimate fellowship where each person can grow spiritually.

cells.noCells: No cells registered at the moment.

becomeLeader.title: Want to lead a cell?
becomeLeader.description: If you feel called to lead and disciple others, contact us. We offer complete training and support for new leaders.
becomeLeader.button: I Want to be a Leader

form.subject: Subject

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about our history, mission and values as a Christian community

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Share the love of Jesus Christ through the word, fellowship and service, building lives and strengthening the faith of each person who is part of our community.

love.title: Love
love.description: We demonstrate the love of Christ in all our actions and relationships

communion.title: Communion
communion.description: We value unity and fellowship among brothers in faith

word.title: Word
word.description: We base our faith and teaching on the Word of God

service.title: Service
service.description: We serve God and others with dedication and humility

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: The ministry "Speaking about Jesus" was born from the desire to share God's word in a simple and accessible way, reaching hearts and transforming lives through the gospel.
history.paragraph2: We started as a small Bible study group and grew to become a vibrant faith community, always focused on Jesus Christ as the center of everything.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.paragraph1: To be a Christian community that positively impacts society, forming disciples committed to God's word and service to others.
vision.paragraph2: We seek to be a church relevant to our generation, without losing the essence of the gospel, always proclaiming Jesus as Savior and Lord.

hero.title: Speaking about Jesus
hero.subtitle: A place to share God's word, grow in faith and build lives through the gospel of Christ.

featuredPosts.title: Latest Reflections
featuredPosts.subtitle: Discover the latest words of edification and spiritual growth
featuredPosts.noPosts: No posts found at the moment. Come back soon for new reflections!
